content: Can you guys tell me what rustc_middle::thir::ExprKind::Use does? The documentation is not very helpful
It seems that it's generated when you do a coercion using as
Probably jsut there to ensure that each HIR expr has a corresponding THIR expr and preserve the span.
Thanks for the help @Gary Guo. I still don't understand ExprKind::Use but that is because of my noobness
You may find it useful to grep for ExprKind::Use in compiler/ and look at the surrounding code.
